member.name: M:Task3.Tests.FigureCuttingTests.CircleCutting_CircleFromCircle_MaterialPaper

member.name: T:Task3.Tests.FigureTests
member.summary: Class testing the creation of figures. Partial class.
member.remarks: Includes tests to create a circle, rectangle, square.

member.remarks: Includes tests to create a trapezium, a triangle.

member.name: M:Task3.Tests.FigureTests.CreateCircle_RadiusIsZeroMaterialFilm_ArgumentException
member.arrange: Radius = 0.0; Material = Film;
member.assert: Argument exception: The radius of the circle can not be equal zero or be less than zero.

member.name: M:Task3.Tests.FigureTests.CreateCircle_RadiusIsZeroMaterialPaper_ArgumentException
member.arrange: Radius = 0.0; Material = Paper;
member.assert: Argument exception: The radius of the circle can not be equal zero or be less than zero.

member.name: M:Task3.Tests.FigureTests.CreateCircle_RadiusIsZeroMaterialPaperPainted_ArgumentException
member.assert: Argument exception: The radius of the circle can not be equal zero or be less than zero.

member.assert: Argument exception: The radius of the circle can not be equal zero or be less than zero.

member.name: M:Task3.Tests.FigureTests.CreateCircle_RadiusIsNegativeMaterialPaperPainted_ArgumentException
member.assert: Argument exception: The radius of the circle can not be equal zero or be less than zero.

member.assert: Figure circle with parameters: radius = 3.0, material = film

member.arrange: Radius = positive value; Material = Paper;
member.assert: Figure circle with parameters: radius = 5.5, material = paper

member.assert: Figure circle with parameters: radius = 12.1, material = paper, color = blue
